us.derfers.tribex.rapids

Class ScriptEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.derfers.tribex.rapids.ScriptEngine

  • public class ScriptEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a basic javax.scriptengine style interface for Mozilla's Rhino JavaScript Engine.
    Author:
    TribeX

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable scope
      The global scope for the engine, contains information about the execution enviornment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScriptEngine()
      Populates the scope with the ImporterTopLevel variables.
